conclusion: To determine the change in magnetic flux through the coil as it rotates.
The initial orientation of the coil is such that the normal to the plane of the coil is along the y-axis.
The magnetic field B is along the x-axis.
The angle between the magnetic field and the normal to the coil is 90 degrees.
The initial magnetic flux Φi through the coil is 0 Wb.
After rotating 60° downward around the z-axis, the normal to the plane of the coil makes an angle of 30° with the y-axis.
The angle between the magnetic field and the new normal to the coil is 60 degrees.
The magnetic flux Φf through the coil after rotation is 0.02 Wb.
The change in magnetic flux ΔΦ is 0.02 Wb.
The change in the magnetic flux passing through the coil is 0.02 Weber.
